name: LuaResource
description: Lua resource class. This class is used to fetch resources from lua.

functions.name: getResourceAssetSd
functions.description: This function gets resource from package, if can not it gets from other data location.

functions.name: getResourceSdAsset
functions.description: This function gets resource from other data location, if can not it gets from package.

functions.name: getResourceAsset
functions.description: This function gets resource from package.

functions.name: getResourceSd
functions.description: This function gets resource from other data location.

functions.name: getResource
functions.description: This function gets resource based on defines.lua config

functions.name: getResourceRef
functions.description: This function gets resource based on defines.lua config
